textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Frank from Chicago, IL 12/23/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 17 Categories Comments Bang for the buck I promise you if you go to daley college it will be worth the time and the effort. It will be worth every penny spent because not only do they have great classroom atmosphere they have great teachers who teach the material in them. Am enjoying being here I love it here I enjoy the friends I've made. I've enjoyed the different activities that go on here for the cultures n its just so amazing. Am learning a lot There's a lot of material that is given to me to remember and because of that I'm learning a lot but I'm also remembering it too. Login to rate or
